publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2898 Shiona Baird: Independent Supermarket Regulator—That the Parliament welcomes the research by NFU Scotland (NFUS) published on 1 June 2005 on how supermarkets misuse their dominant position; notes the NFUS’ concern that supermarket suppliers fear complaining against ill-treatment, and supports the NFUS call for the UK Government and competition authorities to establish an independent regulator to investigate complaints and protect suppliers from reprisals. R

S2M-2898 Independent Supermarket Regulator (lodged on 1 June 2005) Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Eleanor Scott*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Dr Jean Turner*, Fiona Hyslop*, Patrick Harvie*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S2M-2898 Shiona Baird: Independent Supermarket Regulator—That the Parliament welcomes the research by NFU Scotland (NFUS) published on 1 June 2005 on how supermarkets misuse their dominant position; notes the NFUS’ concern that supermarket suppliers fear complaining against ill-treatment, and supports the NFUS call for the UK Government and competition authorities to establish an independent regulator to investigate complaints and protect suppliers from reprisals. R Supported by: Chris Ballance, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Eleanor Scott, Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Dr Jean Turner, Fiona Hyslop, Patrick Harvie, Rosie Kane, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2898 Independent Supermarket Regulator (lodged on 1 June 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2898 Independent Supermarket Regulator (lodged on 1 June 2005) Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2898 Independent Supermarket Regulator (lodged on 1 June 2005) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-2898 Independent Supermarket Regulator (lodged on 1 June 2005) Linda Fabiani*
